abstract: The U.S. will play France in an exhibition game on Nov. 11 in Paris.
snippet: The U.S. will play France in an exhibition game on Nov. 11 in Paris.
lead_paragraph: U.S. Soccer announced Friday that the national team would play a friendly against France on Nov. 11 at the Stade de France outside Paris.

headline.main: U.S. to Play France in Paris on Nov. 11
